statements: SELECT * FROM SocialMediaMentions;
SELECT post_text FROM SocialMediaMentions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, post_text, mention_date FROM SocialMediaMentions WHERE mentioned_competitor = 'CompetitorA';
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaMentions ORDER BY mention_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_mentions FROM SocialMediaMentions WHERE mention_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, post_text, mention_date, mentioned_competitor FROM SocialMediaMentions WHERE mention_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY mention_date DESC;
SELECT id, post_text FROM SocialMediaMentions WHERE mentioned_competitor = 'Competitor1' ORDER BY id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_mentions, mentioned_competitor FROM SocialMediaMentions GROUP BY mentioned_competitor;
SELECT id, post_text FROM SocialMediaMentions WHERE post_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, post_text, mention_date FROM SocialMediaMentions WHERE mention_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM competitors_mentions WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT mention_content, mention_date FROM competitors_mentions WHERE social_media_platform = 'Facebook';
SELECT trend_topic, sentiment_score FROM market_trends WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM competitors_mentions ORDER BY mention_date DESC;
SELECT trend_id, trend_topic FROM market_trends ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitors_mentions WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT mention_content FROM competitors_mentions WHERE mention_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT trend_topic, trend_description, sentiment_score FROM market_trends WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY trend_topic DESC;
SELECT social_media_platform, COUNT(*) AS total_mentions FROM competitors_mentions GROUP BY social_media_platform ORDER BY total_mentions DESC;
SELECT trend_topic, COUNT(*) AS total_trends FROM market_trends GROUP BY trend_topic HAVING total_trends > 5 ORDER BY total_trends DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitors_mentions;
SELECT competitor_name, mention_text, mention_date FROM competitors_mentions;
SELECT mention_id, competitor_name, mention_date FROM competitors_mentions WHERE competitor_name = 'Apple';
SELECT mention_id, mention_text, mention_date FROM competitors_mentions ORDER BY mention_date DESC;
SELECT trend_topic, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM competitors_mentions;
SELECT mention_id, competitor_name, mention_source FROM competitors_mentions WHERE mention_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT competitor_name, COUNT(*) AS mention_count FROM competitors_mentions GROUP BY competitor_name;
SELECT competitor_name, performance_rating, performance_date FROM competitor_performance ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, trend_topic, trend_date FROM competitors_mentions JOIN market_trends ON competitors_mentions.mention_source = market_trends.trend_source;
SELECT * FROM competitor_mentions;
SELECT id, mention_text, mention_date FROM competitor_mentions WHERE mention_source = 'Twitter';
SELECT mention_date, mention_text FROM competitor_mentions ORDER BY mention_date DESC;
SELECT trend_topic, trend_date, trend_volume FROM competitor_trends WHERE trend_volume > 1000;
SELECT sentiment_id, mention_id, sentiment_score FROM competitor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM competitor_mentions WHERE mention_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY mention_source DESC;
SELECT mention_text, mention_date FROM competitor_mentions WHERE mention_source = 'Twitter' LIMIT 10;
SELECT trend_topic, trend_volume FROM competitor_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY trend_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_handles WHERE handle_verified = true AND handle_user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT sentiment_score FROM competitor_sentiment WHERE mention_id = 10 AND sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM competitors;
SELECT competitor_name, mention_date FROM competitors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT mention_content, engagement_type FROM mentions JOIN engagements ON mentions.mention_id = engagements.mention_id WHERE mentions.mention_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM competitors WHERE mention_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT competitor_name, mention_content FROM competitors WHERE competitor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT competitor_name, mention_date, mention_content, engagement_type FROM competitors JOIN engagements ON competitors.id = engagements.mention_id;
